column1: Unable to save new entity. Error: %1
column2: Unable to save new entity. Error: %1

column1: Show Relevant Locations List for Products with Assigned MSI Stock
column2: Show Relevant Locations List for Products with Assigned MSI Stock

column1:
Enables Location List at Product pages.
                            Location should have assigned MSI Source to appear in the list.
                            The list will appear for Products, assigned Stocks of which are assotiated with any available Location's Source.
                            Only locations where Product is In Stock would appear by default.
column2:
Enables Location List at Product pages.
                            Location should have assigned MSI Source to appear in the list.
                            The list will appear for Products, assigned Stocks of which are assotiated with any available Location's Source.
                            Only locations where Product is In Stock would appear by default.

column1: Include Locations at which Product is Out Of Stock into Product Location List
column2: Include Locations at which Product is Out Of Stock into Product Location List

column1: Allows displaying Locations at which the product is not available immediately (Out Of Stock).
column2: Allows displaying Locations at which the product is not available immediately (Out Of Stock).
